Package nzilbb.encoding

Class XSAMPA2DISC

  • java.lang.Object
    • nzilbb.encoding.PhonemeTranslator
      • nzilbb.encoding.XSAMPA2DISC
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Function<String,​String>, UnaryOperator<String>
    public class XSAMPA2DISC
extends PhonemeTranslator
    Translates X-SAMPA-encoded phonemic transcriptions like str\eIndZ to CELEX-DISC-encoded transcriptions like str1n_. // duplicate of "eI" // 'open schwa' (…ê) // flap - this is an extension to DISC
    Mapping
    X-SAMPADISCExample
    Vowels
    i: ‚Üí i
    A: ‚Üí #
    O: ‚Üí $
    u: ‚Üí u
    3: ‚Üí 3
    eI ‚Üí 1
    aI ‚Üí 2
    OI ‚Üí 4
    @U ‚Üí 5
    aU ‚Üí 6
    I@ ‚Üí 7
    E@ ‚Üí 8
    U@ ‚Üí 9
    {~ ‚Üí c
    A~: ‚Üí q
    {~: ‚Üí 0
    O~: ‚Üí ~
    Vowels output by MAUSBasic
    @} ‚Üí 5
    Ae ‚Üí 2
    {Q ‚Üí 6
    {I ‚Üí 1
    6 ‚Üí @
    o: ‚Üí $
    O", 'Q
    4", 'L
    (different from SAMPA)
    }: ‚Üí }
    Consonants
    tS ‚Üí J
    dZ ‚Üí _
    r* ‚Üí R
    (different from SAMPA)
